Source.Name: lxqt-runner
Source.Summary: Tool used to launch programs quickly by typing their names.
Source.Description: Provides a GUI that comes up on the desktop and allows for launching applications or shutting down the system.

Package.Name: lxqt-runner
Package.Summary: Tool used to launch programs quickly by typing their names.
Package.Description: Provides a GUI that comes up on the desktop and allows for launching applications or shutting down the system.
